patthana20.4:1.1: Nasaññojanaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:2.1: Naganthaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:3.1: Naoghaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:4.1: Nayogaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:5.1: Nanīvaraṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.4:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.4:7.1: Naparāmāsaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana20.4:8.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
